member.name: MFTOPOLOGY_DXVA_MODE
member.summary: Specifies whether the topology loader enables Microsoft DirectX Video Acceleration (DXVA) in the topology.

member.name: MFTOPOLOGY_DXVA_MODE.MFTOPOLOGY_DXVA_DEFAULT
member.summary: The topology loader enables DXVA on the decoder if possible, and drops optional Media Foundation transforms (MFTs) that do not support DXVA.

member.name: MFTOPOLOGY_DXVA_MODE.MFTOPOLOGY_DXVA_NONE
member.summary: The topology loader disables all video acceleration. This setting forces software processing, even when the decoder supports DXVA.

member.name: MFTOPOLOGY_DXVA_MODE.MFTOPOLOGY_DXVA_FULL
member.summary: The topology loader enables DXVA on every MFT that supports it.
